query:
SELECT COUNT(flow_id) AS flows_count
            FROM flows
            WHERE
                scope_data->>'dataset_id' = ANY($1)
                AND ($2::text IS NULL OR flow_type = $2)
                AND (cast($3 as flow_status_type) IS NULL OR flow_status = $3)
                AND (cast($4 as TEXT[]) IS NULL OR initiator = ANY($4))
